mapper.select: SELECT myno, uid, eduno, mycon, mydate, mystate, mycomple FROM myeducation WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY myno
SELECT sano, sadate, stime, astate FROM servicea WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY sano
SELECT jj.jjim_icon, ani.anipic, ani.aname, ani.gender, ani.age, ani.weight, ani.genop, ani.vac FROM jjim jj join animal ani ON jj.anino = ani.anino WHERE ani.uid = 'kim9595'
